title: Why the Left MUST Destroy the Bible | Guests: John Ziegler & Carol Roth | 9/1/22
description:
Host of "With the Benefit of Hindsight" John Ziegler joins to debunk the story of racial slurs being hurled at a Duke volleyball player during a match with BYU. Glenn pleads for his audience to read their Bibles and goes into how influential the Bible has been in our society. Recovering investment banker Carol Roth joins to discuss the weirdness of China's housing market and what that means globally. Glenn discusses the power and importance of language and how fast it can become weaponized. Glenn dives into the lunacy of Australia's new emissions reduction effort and why non-Australians should care. Glenn presents this week's Badge of Merit to a selfless woman who runs a nonprofit for at-risk youths, veterans, and youth in foster care.
